subject: Missing haptics.
description_text:
Good afternoon,
I recently ordered the newest simsonn pro x ultra pedals with haptics and rgb feedback.
The pedals have just arrived however they do not have any haptics with them.
Please could you help me to sort this discrepancy out?
Kindest regards
Richard Oldcorn.
Sent from Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>

conversations.body_text: Hi Richard Oldcorn,  Please provide your order number, and I’ll check whether the items were shipped separately.

Good morning,
My order number is #SSN3097
Thankyou for getting back to me, however I’ve figured it out now, on my original email from simsonn, it gave two tracking numbers which I hadn’t noticed originally.
My second package is  currently in a distribution centre in London .
I’m sorry for any inconvenience on your end.
Kindest regards
Richard.

Sent from Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Hi Richard Oldcorn,    We apologize for any confusion this may have caused. Thank you for letting us know. Have fun!
